item.title: About
item.description: I’m an Information Systems student specializing in data science and AI applications! I’m an Information Systems student focusing on data science and AI applications. I love solving real-world problems with data and exploring the infinite possibilities of AI. In my spare time, I am also a visual enthusiast who loves photography. Through the lens, I capture the wonderful moments of life, and I look forward to using my professional knowledge to bring changes to education, health and other fields, so that technology can truly benefit society!

item.title: Food Delivery App associated with Food Supplier
item.description:
Introduction Link to heading

This food order system, built using Java Swing, provides a comprehensive platform that connects farms, food companies, and their branches with customers. The system allows customers to browse menus, place orders, and enjoy a wide variety of culinary delights. In turn, farms and food companies efficiently manage their offerings, while ensuring a smooth and seamless link between the agricultural source and the end consumer.

item.title: NBA Game Experience
item.description: I went with a friend to see a regular season NBA game in Boston to watch the Celtics, and it was truly an unforgettable experience! The atmosphere was electric right from the start, with fans wearing green jerseys and chanting slogans. (Of course, we wore green too!)The moment the players entered the stadium, the crowd erupted, and the cheers were deafening. Being there, I felt an indescribable sense of unity that you simply can’t experience on TV. The game was full of excitement and tension. Celtics players played their hearts out, and every defensive and offensive play, especially a few key three-pointers, brought the atmosphere to a peak. Every time the Celtics scored, the entire crowd roared with excitement. Watching a game isn’t just about enjoying the sport; it’s a chance to share a memorable experience with friends. We discussed tactics, predicted the score, and even joked about some of the players’ special moves. After the game, we went to neighboring stores to buy some souvenirs. This night truly made me appreciate the joy of live sports and the camaraderie it fosters.

item.title: A leisurely stroll in Boston
item.description:
Walking around Boston Common is a truly relaxing experience. The park feels like the heart of Boston, surrounded by towering skyscrapers, but once you step inside, it feels like you’ve entered a different world entirely. The park is full of lush green grass, ancient trees, and serene lakes, and yet, it’s constantly alive with people coming and going at what feels like a leisurely yet rhythmic pace.

As I walked here, I couldn’t help but feel the weight of history in the air. This park is more than just a green space—it’s a witness to Boston’s storied past. From its origins as a military training ground to its role in protests before the American Revolution, Boston Common has been the site of countless significant moments in history. As I strolled past the monuments and statues, I could almost hear the echoes of the past. And yet, despite its rich history, the park doesn’t feel old at all. It’s a vibrant, modern space where people of all ages and backgrounds come to unwind. Students, office workers, families, and tourists—everyone gathers here to walk, exercise, or simply relax. I saw people sunbathing on the grass, flying kites, and sitting in small groups chatting about anything and everything. The atmosphere is lively but relaxed, a perfect blend of energy and calm.

item.title: Christmas in New York
item.description:
New York City during the holiday season feels like stepping into a magical snow globe. The streets are alive with the sparkle of Christmas lights, the air smells faintly of roasted chestnuts, and everywhere you turn, there’s something that makes you stop and smile.

I spent an afternoon at Bryant Park’s Winter Village, sipping on hot chocolate while wandering through the cozy little stalls filled with handmade trinkets and festive treats. The chilly weather couldn’t dampen the warmth of the season—street performers singing Christmas carols, small cafes offering peppermint lattes, and the buzz of cheerful conversations made it impossible not to feel the holiday spirit. It’s those little, unexpected moments that make this time of year so magical.

item.title: A
item.description:
Project Overview Link to heading

As we manage a company, we not only have to produce products, but also we need to understand the sales status of each type of product in different regions, different channels, and additional merchants, which enhances the importance of analyzing datasets. Therefore, the project will analyze different tiers, types of products, and areas and build models to predict sales.

Key Question Link to heading

Depending on several factors (Reviews, Price, Location, etc.) to predict the ranking of the property.
